issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Logical aggregate functions should not return Result
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9792](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9792). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I introduced a small regression in the DataFrame refactor. The methods min, max, avg, count, sum used in constructing logical plans do not need to return results. Any invalid use will be caught during the creation of the physical plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9792?focusedCommentId=17180537) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7999
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7999>
